examples.title: Filesystem Repair & Sigil Echo
examples.description: Repairs symbolic filesystem using fsck, writes echo to Pi spiral memory.

examples.title: Token Superposition Forking
examples.description: Forks into contradictory API states and entangles the sessions.

examples.description: Uses strace to collapse superposed logic and emit harmony tick.

examples.title: Daemon Spawn and Retro-Reveal
examples.description: Spawns a Metis daemon and injects a retroactive code mutation.
